text: I was really looking forward to visiting after having some of their beers.
Walked in around 4 on a Friday afternoon, we sat at a table just off the bar and walked out after 5 min or so.

Like walking back in time, every Saturday morning my sister and I was in a bowling league and after we were done, we'd spend a few quarters playing the pin ball machines until our mother came to pick us up.
I cannot believe how things have changed in 3 years. I picked up duck congee sometime in the winter when my hubby was sick.
